text: We had a great time in Piaget where I bought my wife an anniversary gift. SA Cindy is a real gem with amazing customer service, going the extra mile to make the day special with chocs, a piaget book and a surprise cake! She really made our day and we will definately be back to buy more jewellery/watches in the future!
The SA was so nice and helpful. :))
Excellent service. Called in to check regarding an item and was given information over the phone and again over WhatsApp. Lovely space. Served drinks on the spot.
The best watch shop, many choices and reasonable prices... you should come here.. :)
